summary.description:
PiVR is an affordable and versatile closed-loop platform to study unrestrained sensorimotor behavior.

PiVR has been developed to track a variety of animals in real time and present them with light stimuli. The manual can be found at www.PiVR.org.

A preprint has been uploaded to bioRxiv: https://doi.org/10.1101/2019.12.20.885442.
